title: Charles Barkley
summary: Charles Wade Barkley (born February 20, 1963) is an American former professional basketball player who is an analyst on Inside the NBA. Nicknamed "Sir Charles", "Chuck" and "the Round Mound of Rebound", Barkley was an 11-time NBA All-Star, an 11-time member of the All-NBA Team, and the 1993 NBA Most Valuable Player (MVP). During the NBA's 50th anniversary, he was named one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History.[2] He was again named to the 75 Greatest Players in NBA History for the NBAâ€™s 75th anniversary.[3]
